question.title: How set OOTB common property in custom Spring Boot Starter?
question.body:
I've implemented my own Spring Boot 3 Starter app and few other Spring Boot 3 apps which are using that starter.
Those "apps" are REST APIs and "starter" holds common configuration for those APIs (like proxy settings, OpenAPIconfig etc.)

I need to increase maximum header length for all of my APIs, therefore I would like to set server.max-http-request-header-size once, in my starter app. Is it possible?
